mod.name: === Core ===
mod.description: Core Mod List.

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: AppleSkin
mod.description: Adds various food-related HUD improvements

mod.name: ArchitectureCraft
mod.description: Distinguished architectural features for your Minecraft buildings.

mod.name: AutoRegLib
mod.description: Automatically item, block, and model registration for mods.

mod.name: Akashic Tome
mod.description: The book of books.

mod.name: B.A.S.E
mod.description: Placeholder Text

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: Bed Bugs
mod.description: Adds a button and command to leave the bed/server when stuck!

mod.name: Better Achievements
mod.description: An improvement to the Achievementscreen

mod.name: BetterMinecraftChat
mod.description: Emoticons, Image Preview, Tabs and Filters. Client-side only.

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds over 50 new biomes, blocks, and more!

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Simple Covers
mod.description: Basic microblocks (covers, etc.) for MCMultipart

mod.name: GenDustry
mod.description: Adds industrial apiaries, advanced genetic manipulation and mutation (Forestry addon)

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Unlimited Fluid Transport

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft. This time with a fancy number in front.

mod.name: Natural Pledge
mod.description: The successor to Botanical Addons from 1.7.

mod.name: Brandon's Core
mod.description: This is the core mod that will be used by most of my mods from now on

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: This is a mod that was originally made for the Tolkiencraft mod pack but it has since evolved way beyond that. This mod adds a mot of extremely expensive ant powerful end game items as well as a lot of random useful bits and peaces.

mod.name: BetterBedrockGen
mod.description: Bedrock Is Flat

mod.name: Buttons
mod.description: Adds buttons to the lefthand side of the screen.

mod.name: Chameleon
mod.description: Shared code and render support for mods. Used by jaquadro's mods.

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Chisel: A New Hope. For 1.7 and 1.8!

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: Client Tweaks
mod.description: There, I fixed Minecraft for you.

mod.name: CodeChicken Core
mod.description: Base common code for all chickenbones mods.

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management Credits: Sanguine - Texture Supporters:

mod.name: CodeChicken Lib
mod.description: CodeChickenLib is a library of systems to help make various aspects of minecraft modding easier. It contains libraries for 3D math and transformations, model rendering, packets, config, colours, asm and a few other things..

mod.name: Translocator
mod.description: Translocates stuff! Credits: MouseCop - Textures Supporters:

mod.name: Controlling
mod.description: Adds a search bar to the Key-Bindings menu

mod.name: Cooking for Blockheads
mod.description: Adds a cooking book and multiblock kitchens that only shows recipes you can make with what you currently have in your inventory.

mod.name: Crafttweaker
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Mod Tweaker
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for CraftTweaker, a recipe manipulator utility for Minecraft. It allows you to modify the recipes of other mods that add their own crafting mechanics

mod.name: MTLib
mod.description: Library files for Minetweaker Addons

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Cyberware
mod.description: Augmentation in Minecraft

mod.name: WIRED: More Augs
mod.description: Expanding upon Cyberware with Questionable Choices

mod.name: ElecCore | Rendering Library
mod.description: Shared code for Forge mods

mod.name: DeepResonance
mod.description: Power generation based on resonanting crystals

mod.name: Ender Compass
mod.description: The ender compass is an item that leads to strongholds.

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and all sorts of stuff and bling.

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: More Mobs

mod.name: Ender Utilities
mod.description: Some random, hopefully fun, and possibly even useful utilities (Modjam 4)

mod.name: Embers
mod.description: Dwarven-style Magitech Mod

mod.name: Extra Utilities 2
mod.description: A bunch of useful things.

mod.name: Fast Leave Decay
mod.description: Makes leave decay faster

mod.name: Pink Flamingo
mod.description: Adds a decorative pink flamingo block.

mod.name: FoamFix
mod.description: FoamFix is a mod which makes Minecraft go fast - by which I mean use less memory.

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: More Bees
mod.description: Adds more bees to forestry

mod.name: Gear Swapper
mod.description: Handy block to swap your gear

mod.name: grimoire of gaia
mod.description: Nightmare's come to life and more created

mod.name: Guide-API
mod.description: Simple mod guide creation.

mod.name: HideNames
mod.description: Adds commands to hide and show the name that displays above your head.

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: Advanced Machines
mod.description: Upgraded IC2 machines

mod.name: Advanced Solar Panels
mod.description: Advanced solar panels is new generation of using solar power. This is addon for IndustrialCraft 2.

mod.name: Gravitation Suite
mod.description: Gravitation Suite gives you ability to fly. This is addon for IndustrialCraft 2

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Backpacks
mod.description: Upgradeable backpacks!

mod.name: IvToolkit
mod.description: This is a framework that I mostly use in my own mods, for shared functionality.

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: JEI Bees
mod.description: Adds JEI recipes that show breeding and products from Forestry bees, trees and butterflies.

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: Levels
mod.description: A new, innovative leveling mod, focused around leveling up weapons to gain unique boosts.

mod.name: Light Level Overlay Reloaded
mod.description: A mod visualizes the light level on top of blocks.

mod.name: Furnus
mod.description: A configurable furnace and pulverizer

mod.name: LunatriusCore
mod.description: A collection of utilities for Lunatrius' mods.

mod.name: Stackie
mod.description: Stack entities into groups to decrease lag.

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: MalisisBlocks
mod.description: Vanishing and mixed blocks.

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Tinker I/O
mod.description: Smeltery Upgrade!

mod.name: Tinkers Tool Leveling
mod.description: A small mod that gives your tools XP and awards extra modifiers on levelup

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Heyo, Redwood trees! Chop them all day long!

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: compatlayer
mod.description: Compatibility layer to make migrating between different vanilla/forge versions easier

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: RFTools Dimensions
mod.description: RFTools Dimensions Addon

mod.name: RFTools Control
mod.description: RFTools Control Addon

mod.name: MCMultiPart
mod.description: A universal multipart API for MC 1.8.9

mod.name: MattDahEpic Core
mod.description: Base Mod for all MattDahEpic mods.

mod.name: Auto Ore Dictionary Converter
mod.description: Converts specified ore dictionary items automatically or on keybinding.

mod.name: Exchange Orb
mod.description: Simple mod for converting various vanilla resources and mob drops.

mod.name: MineMenu
mod.description: MineMenu supports key bindings, commands, and creative functions to make your life easier.

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool
mod.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mod.name: Mod Name Tooltip
mod.description: Show the ItemStack's mod on its tooltip.

mod.name: ModPack Utilities
mod.description: will add various tools for modpack developers

mod.name: ModPack Basic Tools
mod.description: Adds Change logs, info, and bug reporting tab.

mod.name: Neat
mod.description: Minimalistic Functional Unit Plates for the modern Minecrafter

mod.name: Nether Core
mod.description: Adds fun and interesting things to the Nether.

mod.name: NetherPortalFix
mod.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mod.name: Not Enough Wands
mod.description: Wands, wands, and more wands

mod.name: OMLib
mod.description: Lib for OMT and its companion mods!

mod.name: Open Modular Turrets
mod.description: All a man needs are meat ingots, and big ass turrets. Adds a heap of new turrets and upgrades!

mod.name: Open Modular Passive Defense
mod.description: All a man needs are meat ingots, and big ass walls. Adds new walls and fences!

mod.name: OptionSync
mod.description: A Mod about syncing your options between Minecraft instances

mod.name: OreExcavation
mod.description: Allows players to mine whole veins of ore, cut down whole trees or any other tool based action in one go. Simple easy to understand configs are also provided for mod pack developers

mod.name: Ore Tweaker
mod.description: Allows you to tweak vanilla ore generation

mod.name: p455w0rd's Library
mod.description: Library component for all of p455w0rd's mods

mod.name: Wireless Crafting Grid
mod.description: Refined Storage addons that adds a wireless version of the crafting grid

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: Expanding minecraft's food system.

mod.name: Progressive Automation
mod.description: A mod that adds automation that can be built in the early game and upgraded throughout late game.

mod.name: Psi
mod.description: Psionic SpellCasting Instruments

mod.name: PSIonic Upgrades
mod.description: Assorted addons for PSI.

mod.name: Quark
mod.description: Small things.

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: RebornCore
mod.description: RebornCore, A core set of classes.

mod.name: QuantumStorage
mod.description: A mod that adds a Deep Storage Unit to hold all the things

mod.name: Recurrent Complex
mod.description: Adds structures to worldgen, handles exporting and importing structures, and provides build tools.

mod.name: Refined Relocation
mod.description: Sorting Chests. More to come soon.

mod.name: Refined Storage
mod.description: A Minecraft mod all about storage.

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: Roguelike Dungeons
mod.description: Adds randomized dungeons to the world

mod.name: Roots
mod.description: Druidic Magic Mod

mod.name: Router Reborn
mod.description: Bringing the router back to 1.8.9

mod.name: Realistic Terrain Generation
mod.description: Adds a new world type which generates realistic terrain for Overworld biomes.

mod.name: ShetiPhian-Core
mod.description: Core set of files needed by ShetiPhians mods

mod.name: EnderTanks
mod.description: Store liquids inside a subspace pocket located in the End.

mod.name: Multi-Storage
mod.description: Vaults, Hidden Chests, and Stacking Chests

mod.name: Terraqueous
mod.description: Fruit Trees/Vines/Plants, Cloud Blocks, Flowers, Doodads, Pergola, Tools

mod.name: Simple Dimensions
mod.description: A simple mod that allows you to create additional dimensions.

mod.name: Simply Jetpacks 2
mod.description: Redstone Flux jetpacks and more

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: A carttastic mod adding a near infinite number of carts possible to the game, through the creation of modular carts.

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: Steve's Factory Manager is a mod which allows you to set up systems that moves and manages items between inventories and machines

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Drawers & Bits
mod.description: Specialized storage drawers for Chisels & Bits.

mod.name: Storage Drawers Extras
mod.description: Additional drawers from third party materials.

mod.name: Super Circuit Maker
mod.description: Ever wanted to build custom logic gates and complex circuits? Now you can!

mod.name: Super Crafting Frame
mod.description: An item frame that can craft items when punched.

mod.name: Tiny Progressions
mod.description: Cobblegens, Growth Crystals and Watering Cans oh my!

mod.name: Tomb Many Graves
mod.description: Stores your stuff when you bite the dust.

mod.name: The One Probe
mod.description: A Probe to rule them all!

mod.name: TrashSlot
mod.description: Adds a trash slot to the inventory screen that allows deletion of unwanted items.

mod.name: WanionLib
mod.description: Shared Code Library Used by (not)all WanionCane mods!

mod.name: UniDict
mod.description: a mod about unifying all the things.

mod.name: Valkyrie Lib
mod.description: Library for all of ValkyrieofNight's Mods

mod.name: Environmental Tech
mod.description: Environmental Tech is a mod containing a vast selection of multiblock machines. Ranging from multiblock solar panels, lightning rods to multiblock Void mining machines. This mod is still in the very early stages and has a lot more to come.

mod.name: Woot
mod.description: The alternative mob spawner/grinder system

mod.name: Zero CORE
mod.description: Utility mod and multiblock API

mod.name: Extreme Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) and Tesla power. This is a port of the 1.7.10 mod Big Reactors from ErogenousBeef

mod.name: === Optional Mods ===
mod.description: Optional Mod List.

mod.name: Crafting Tweaks
mod.description: Allows you to rotate or clear the crafting matrix by the press of a button, in any (supported) crafting window.

mod.name: FTB Tweaks
mod.description: Allows you to have multiple Recipe Modes.

mod.name: Item Scroller
mod.description: Move items in inventory GUIs by scrolling the mouse wheel over slots with items in them

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. JourneyMap API: v1.9.4-1.2. Built: 2016-06-30-01:09:28.

mod.name: MapWriter
mod.description: An open source mini map mod

mod.name: Schematica
mod.description: Import and export Minecraft schematic files in Minecraft!

mod.name: Surge
mod.description: A tweak mod that improves Minecraft performance and stability.
